item.title: Comparing ADC Performance of Espressif SoCs
item.description: This article compares the Analog-to-Digital Converter (ADC) performance of different Espressif SoCs and shows the techniques to improve the ADC accuracy using software calibration. The results should help developers choose the most suitable SoC and optimize it for their application’s accuracy and voltage range requirements.
